name: Kinky Hub
description:
You’re  working as an Intern IT at KinkyHub, you come to work your boring nightshift as you have been doing for the last couple of months. Expecting to have a calm night you’re surprised by a quick growth on the numbers of viewers you’re getting on the website. You don’t understand what is happening! Turns out, a pandemic has struck the world and corporate has decided to give everyone free premium accounts, but those dumbasses forgot to upgrade the servers! It’s now up to you to keep them from dying until your shift is over and it becomes other fool’s responsibility.

You’ll need to keep viewership up, but you also need to prevent the servers from overheating. Produce entertaining porn videos, use toys, cool up servers, manage the office and keep everything squeaky clean to avoid losing your job! 

Hints:

Use toys to make better porn videos
The better the videos the more viewers it’ll get you

You have to keep the rooms clean after a video has been filmed
Your servers can overheat. If they do so you won’t be getting any views from those servers until they have cooled down
Use fans to cool down servers
The pornstars will ask you for things they need while making videos. Keep them happy to improve their performance

Controls:
Use WASD to move around the room
Use your mouse to look around
Use left click to pick up an object
If you have an object in your hand:
-Use left click on your mouse to let it go
-Use Q and R to rotate it
-Use the mousewheel to pull it closer to you or push it away
-Use the right click on your mouse to throw it
